thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to craft a light_gray_dye first. To craft a light_gray_dye, I need to place 2 oxeye_daisies and 1 bone_meal in the crafting table. Since I have 1 oxeye_daisy at slot 16, I will first move it to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
